title: looking for gold-plat support for team
body:
hey there, we are still in need of a gold to plat support who has a decent champ pool and is willing to co-operate with the team

also looking for someone who preferably can be on most nights, if not all to scrim/flex

hit me up - ign: yes im danger (OR) dangerrlad
p.s shotcalling is a bonus as we are looking for some1 with exp

replies.body: Is it too late to try out?
Plat 3 would love to join your team
Down to play with you guys, hit me up on iGoSolo or Kureneye.
Me!!!! hehe xd P R A N K E D
